description:
John Holland is a fully integrated infrastructure and property group, operating across Australia, New Zealand, and South-East Asia. We’ve been transforming city skylines, connecting regional centers and providing vital infrastructure for more than six decades.

​

Our contracting and services capabilities cover the full spectrum of the traditional building and civil engineering markets as well as specialist engineering in the resources, energy, marine, water and waste water and tunnelling sectors. We also have unrivalled capability in rail construction, design management, systems engineering and assurance, network maintenance and operations and asset management.

We offer our customers a total service solution, participating in every link of the project lifecycle from origination, financing, and development, to design and construction, operations and maintenance.

A great place to work

At John Holland, women excel in a huge range of roles from Project Engineers and finance professionals to Project Directors and Group General Managers…and everything in between.

We’re committed to building, valuing and promoting inclusion and diversity across our business. We know that diverse perspectives result in greater innovation and better decisions and help us to remain one of Australia’s most recognised and respected construction brands.

Since commencing our first project in 1949 we have taken our responsibility to our people seriously. We work hard to employ, motivate and develop outstanding people – regardless of their background.

John Holland employs a dedicated Inclusion & Diversity team and promotes three inclusion and diversity principles:

  1. All employees are encouraged to be the best they can be. 

  2. All employees are treated fairly and with respect. 

  3. We are all responsible for diversity and inclusion
